title: Information Technology Affairs Management Instruction Letter (IIT-S130-01) | Yönerge
text: Instruction No IIT-S130-01V14 Effective Date 13-01-2012 Update Date 13-03-2025 Related Unit / Owner IT / Bilgi Teknolojileri Direktörlüğü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Aim To describe the design, commissioning, maintenance, and update activities of IT services. Scope All IT services in the service catalog are within the scope of this document. Principle In the operation of services provided by the IT unit, alignment with University strategies, parallel processes, and outputs are observed. Statutory Basis Definitions / Abbreviations IT: Information Technologies SGM: Sabancı Performing Arts Center Service Catalog: Catalog containing IT services Service Manager: IT employee responsible for the service Regulations 1. User accounts and access to IT services are provided in accordance with the User Accounts and Access Management Procedure (PIT-S130-0115). 2. All stakeholders are provided with IT resources for their use within the university. In this context, employees are provided with standard hardware and software in accordance with the Hardware and Software Provision Procedure (PIT-S130-0123). 3. Audio and visual technical support for classrooms and lecture halls, as well as for the cinema and SGM where events are held, is provided in accordance with the Hardware and Software Provision Procedure (PIT-S130-0123). 4. Access to the application software included in the service catalog is provided to users who need to use it for their duties. Access is provided in accordance with the Service Request Management Procedure (PIT-S130-0103). 5. All services provided by the IT Unit are accessed through the Service Catalog. IT managers update the service catalog. 6. Service interruptions are recorded in accordance with the Management of Service Interruptions (PIT-S130-0109). IT personnel responsible for the service are responsible for updating these records. 7. User help and training documents related to IT services are available on the IT website. Service personnel update the relevant IT service pages. 8. The management of the system room where IT services are provided is carried out in accordance with the System Room Management (PIT-S130-0128), and the management of the server systems to be installed in the system room is carried out in accordance with the Server Systems Management (PIT-S130-0112). 9. The IT Unit's annual budget plan is prepared in accordance with the Procedure for Managing Budget Preparations (PIT-S130-0125). 10. The classification of corporate data processed by various applications and software is carried out in accordance with the Procedure for Institutional Data Management (PIT-S130-0129).
